topic.title: Functions or Steps
topic.shortdesc: We consider for function (step) any combination of command, operators and data set that aim to get one specific result. Combination of functions (steps) form business task.

body.p: Step is more appropriate naming as far as it's neutral and understandable for both common business and technical personas.

Steps (functions) may be undertaken in any types of tasks. We divide all possible steps to following types:
Admin Operation Functions
Security Operation Functions
Business Operation Functions
Communication Operation Functions
Report and Analysis Operation Functions
Management Operation Functions
DBOS Maintenance Operation Functions
